column5: Well I had such a good time yesterday that I went back today. It was a lot colder today but the sun was out. Kinda of weird staring at a hole in the ice not paying to much attention to what was going on around me when all of the sudden I hear sleigh bells and there getting louder  :???: Turned around and watch these guys pull up to shore. This little lake is located in a metro park that has a working farm from the 1800's and they came to harvest ice the old fashion way it was kinda of neat to watch.    Well after watching for a while had to get at it because I only had a couple hours to fish. Picked up right where I left off last evening.     I had fun again today  Whopper
Nice job Phil. Thanks for the pics.
Beautiful photos Phil. Looks like a great time.
Attaboy, ,Phil.  Thanks for posting and sharing your pictures.  Good for you for getting some fresh air, sunshine and exercise.
Good stuff, glad ya had a good time   , thanks for the pic's (those black horses are quite the contrast to the snow)...
The Mennonites were involved in what is truly "ICE FISHING".
Well done, Phil!  Some great looking pannies!!  dk

Nice job there!!!  Seeing all these fish makes me want spring even more!  Tried ice fishing for the first time year and I'm not completely sold on it, but who knows...maybe next year.  Great pics and story!
